label: Bobby Pickett on New York at Night (1991)

children.text: The following event was uploaded as one of the main AV items to undergo analysis in this project. The event has annotations and will be used later as a clip for comparative analysis to the other events.

The "Monster Mash" by Bobby "Boris" Pickett and the Crypt-Kickers (1962) was performed live on the New York at Night show in 1991. Thirty-three years after it's initial performance (1964), the following performance has been annotated to showcase the new(er) rendition of the Halloween classic.
